name: Hidden Loot
description:
The game takes some time to load. Please be patient. Thank you :3

Collections menu controls:

A and D - Switch Pages

In Game controls:

Wasd- Move around

Spacebar- Pick up item

Hold Q- View map

E- Enter exit

Hi, welcome to my new game, Hidden Loot.

Inspired from Deep Loot. In this game you find various items hidden in this...world...?

( Note: When you are in the game, click the green flag to go back to the title screen.)

Thank you and have fun :3
